*** UPDATE: I confirmed our happy hour with Rita at Casa Nostra. They are opening just for us on Monday! We will have the bar area and they are planning to put out some of the same great food items that we had last time -- Andrea ***

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Casa Nostra

Casa Nostra website

We had a great happy hour at Casa Nostra in February and thought it would be a fun place to go to again. Casa Nostra is now closed on Mondays, but are willing to open just for our group IF we have at least 30 people who RSVP "YES" to the Happy Hour. I (Andrea) will have to let them know if we have enough people on Wed Nov 7th so PLEASE RSVP if you know you can make it.

Their normal HH until 6:30 but will extend for the NHC till 8:00pm
$1 off every drink (I'll have to check to see if they will offer $1 off food again)

They will provide some buffet-type food -- last time they provided a lot of great food (including some dessert!)

Contact is Andrea (203-641-8083)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***

Post-party location TBD.
item.name: Monday 11/12 Happy Hour -- Casa Nostra
